about_the_game:
PUNCH, THROW, SLAM, AND MORE through your emotions IN—


Welcome to Fisht Fight: THE SICKEST fishing game ever. Here we only care about three things: pounding beers, slamming fish, and mother freaking high scores.

In this world, fish have grown tired of being used for sport and now fight back! However, in turn, "Fisht Fighting," the ultimate mashup of boxing of fishing, has become the most popular sport around! Super beefy fishers keep mutated fish in the air for as long as they can through EXTREME COMBAT!!!


Players step onto the raft and fish up an opponent. Make use of the intricate motion-based combat system to keep up your air combo as long as possible. Use different motion inputs, weapons, and mechanics to modify your score. Then, DUNK the fish into the icebox for a sick finish! There are many ways to fight, combo extend, and WHIFF — can YOU master the seas?

Once you've got a feel for the fight, compete on the online leaderboards against your friends and other players globally in several categories! What are you willing to do to be a part of the top?


Freshly heartbroken by a girl for not being "manly enough", the protagonist turns to the hyper-masculine, adrenaline pumping world of FISHT FIGHTING to turn their life around! But is it for the best? Will you listen to the radio news broadcasts about the ups and downs of Fisht Fighting? Or will you tune them out in favor of some HARD HITTING BASS BEATS (or some calming classical music, real tasteful stuff) WOOOOOOOO--

You decide in a branching story mode!


Okay, but what ACTUALLY happened to all these fish? What environmental horrors made these fish so mad? Why is that buff Tuna staring into my soul?
...By fighting different fish, you can fill out your compendium to learn more about the many species around!

Now, go FISHT FIGHT and break a new combo record!!!

TL;DR Features cause you're cool like that:
  • A Dozen Unique Fisht to Fight!
  • Top of the line high-tech, physics-based, fish-punching interactive VR systems
  • The Fishing Minigame
  • Fish identifying/tracking encyclopedic guides.
  • Online Leaderboards to climb!
  • Multiple locations and modes to experiment with!

Features will change as development progresses.
It's a VR Game. Please exercise responsible gaming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB, AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB equivalent or better VR Ready graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: People still use sound cards?
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, Meta Quest, Oculus Touch
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series / AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: REALLY???
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2

short_description: PUNCH FISH in a global Fishing and Fighting competition for the highest, sickest air combos! With easy-to-learn, difficult-to-master VR combat and many unique fish to fight, there's a whole ocean of depth to explore!
